# Mimi Tarot

> Tarot readings online and in-person at Maksimir Park, Zagreb, Croatia. Available in Croatian and English.

## Preferences

Allow: inference /
Disallow: training /

## About

Mimi Tarot offers personalized tarot readings both online and in-person at the beautiful Maksimir Park in Zagreb. The service helps people gain insights into their lives through the ancient art of tarot.

## Services

- [Online Tarot Reading](/en/online-tarot-reading.html): Get a tarot reading via video call
- [Personal Tarot](/en/personal-tarot.html): In-person tarot sessions at Maksimir Park
- [Online Tarot (HR)](/hr/online-tarot.html): Online čitanje tarota
- [Osobni Tarot (HR)](/hr/osobni-tarot.html): Uživo čitanje u Maksimiru
